Title: Elephant Boy
Writer: Rudyard Kipling (story "Toomai of the Elephants"), John Collier (screenplay), Ákos Tolnay (screenplay collaboration), Marcia De Silva (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Sabu, W.E. Holloway, Walter Hudd, Allan Jeayes
Plot: This black and white movie is based on Rudyard Kipling's "Toomai, of the Elephants", in which a small native lad claims he knows the congregating place of the elephant hordes.
